SIZIMISELE UKUSIZA WENA
Imibuzo nezimpendulo
Yini i-GEP?
I-Gauteng Enterprise Propeller (GEP) yiNhlangano eyasungulwa nguHulumeni Wesifundazwe saseGauteng, ngaphansi koMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komnotho, njengoba inikezwe igunya elikhethekile lokuhlinzeka ama-SMME ngokwesekwa kanye nentuthuko eSifundazweni saseGauteng ngezimali nangezinye izindlela.
Kungani i-GEP yasungulwa?
